channel.title: Comments on: Wads of Cookie Dough

item.title: By: Tom
item.dc:creator: Tom
item.description:
I recently left TwatGuild on our server, after being with them for close to a year to join a smaller, more active, less BS community. Thank god ;)
Yea, grouping with other guilds to do just about anything is a bad move, the truth is 'guild' is just a friendly term used to mask the truth, there are no guilds. They are all gangs, and gangs like warfare.
item.content:encoded:
I recently left TwatGuild on our server, after being with them for close to a year to join a smaller, more active, less BS community. Thank god ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Anona
item.dc:creator: Anona
item.description:
Hot damn Foton's got stories again!
Dramabombs away!
